title: The Devil
creator_credit: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
brief_description: Happily married artist is tempted by beautiful model. The Devil delights in making matters worse. Cast includes Arthur V. johnson, George Gebhardt, Harold Salter, Florence Lawrence, Mack Sennett. Silent film with no intertitles.
